channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Canada gains a surprise 67,000 jobs in October, beating economists' expectations
item.description: The Canadian economy added a surprising 67,000 jobs in October and the unemployment rate ticked down to 6.9 per cent, Statistics Canada said on Friday, beating economists' expectations for the month.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba program working to support First Nations veterans
item.description: Indigenous Veterans Day, taking place Nov. 8, honours the service and sacrifices Indigenous veterans have made to Canada.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Low prices are hurting the oil sector, but Canada has a few advantages
item.description: Canadian oil producers are grappling with low commodity prices, but analysts say the sector is buoyed by certain advantages unique to this side of the border.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Health Canada warns of serious health risks after raid of Kelowna wellness clinic
item.description: The advisory comes in the wake of a Health Canada raid at Ezra Healing in Kelowna, B.C.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Poilievre blasts Carney over budget deficit, spending in free-market speech
item.description: Poilievre delivered his address to a business crowd at the Economic Club of Canada, a few blocks away from the Canadian Club Toronto — where Carney was promoting his budget.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Hamilton residents request Ontario investigate ArcelorMittal Dofasco for releasing emissions far above limits
item.description: With ArcelorMittal Dofasco stalling on its green steel plans and releasing emissions above Ontario’s air-quality regulations, Hamilton resident Jochen Bezner says Canada’s largest steelmaker needs to be held accountable.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Receives Report on Future of Technology, Innovation and Productivity
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Carney tells business crowd a new pipeline project is ‘going to happen'
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney signalled support for a new Alberta pipeline, telling a Bay Street audience “it’s going to happen,” as talks with Premier Danielle Smith continue.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Police Presence at Health Sciences Centre 24-7 to Protect Health-Care Workers and Patients
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Richmond company wants to be part of litigation to fight Cowichan land claim
item.description: The owner of Montrose Properties is now asking to be included in the litigation, as part of an appeal launched by the City of Richmond, and the B.C. and federal governments.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Ottawa and Alberta in formal talks to reset relationship after years of acrimony
item.description: The Alberta and federal governments are in negotiations to sign a major accord that could reset a relationship that had turned toxic for a decade.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Members of Canadian Sudanese community feel abandoned after violence escalates in Sudan
item.description: Members of Toronto’s Sudanese community say they feel abandoned by the Canadian government amid escalating violence in Sudan.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Calgarians optimistic about city's future, question value for tax dollars ahead of budget
item.description: Mayor Jeromy Farkas wants to cut the proposed property tax increase by "at-least half," as new data shows just 42 per cent of Calgarians feel they get good value for their taxes.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Photos: Electronic powerhouses Kaytranada and Justice co-headline Rogers Arena
item.description: The DJ and the French duo combined for a memorable show.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: B.C. government fined $759K by workplace safety agency after death of wildfire fighter
item.description: B.C.'s workplace regulator has leveled a hefty fine on the province for two wildfire fighting incidents from 2023, including one where a 25-year-old firefighter died in a vehicle rollover in the northeast.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Can loyalty and points programs help ease the pinch of holiday spending?
item.description: Loyalty programs can be a good way for consumers to potentially save money during the holiday season, but experts say it's not as easy as just signing up.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Name of founding Hells Angels member appears on Montreal-area tombstone
item.description: On Thursday afternoon, a worker engraved the name Normand Labelle "Billy" on the large, black tombstone in St-Basile-le-Grand, Que., along with the dates 1955 to 2025.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: A Blue Jays return to the World Series next year won't be easy, but fans have hope
item.description: It was a tough Game 7 loss on Saturday, and Blue Jays fans were still licking their World Series wounds this week when Toronto pitcher Shane Bieber exercised his player option, forgoing free agency to stay with the club. Just like that, fans, analysts — and even Blue Jays executives — were talking about the possibility that the team could be back on baseball's biggest stage next year.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Measles Update #42
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Saskatchewan blanketed by season's first big snowfall
item.description: After the first big snowfall of the season for Saskatchewan, people are preparing for winter in all kinds of ways with excitement and dread for the coming months.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: For the first time, Yukon's Legislative Assembly will have more women than men
item.description: Eleven women and one non-binary MLA were elected in this week’s vote — making up 57 per cent of the legislature. It's the first time in Yukon history that men won't make up the majority of the territory's Legislative Assembly.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
